content.en: Load Balancing: Load balancing is an important aspect of cloud computing, and algorithms play a crucial role in enhancing this process. Various research questions have been addressed to understand the prevailing load balancing approaches, different types of load balancing algorithms, and their effectiveness in optimizing resource use and quality of service in cloud computing. These studies highlight that load balancing algorithms distribute workload, improve resource utilization, and ensure proper distribution of loads among virtual machines, ultimately improving the performance of cloud computing.
content.da: Load Balancing: Load balancing er en vigtig aspekt af cloud computing, og algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i at forbedre denne proces. Forskellige forskningsspørgsmål er blevet adresseret for at forstå de gældende load balancing-metoder, forskellige typer af load balancing-algoritmer og deres effektivitet i at optimere ressourceforbruget og kvaliteten af service i cloud computing. Disse studier fremhæver, at load balancing-algoritmer fordeler arbejdsbyrden, forbedrer ressourceudnyttelsen og sikrer en passende fordeling af belastninger blandt virtuelle maskiner, hvilket i sidste ende forbedrer ydeevnen af cloud computing.
